TEXT.P: The final step is to create a title for your graph.

If you click your mouse above the graph, you'll see a cursor and can type in a title. Create a title that describes what this graph is about. The title should be objective and not necessarily include an interpretation of the graph.
Spend some time examining the data points and making sure you understand why each point appears on the graph where it does.
Click on "Continue" when you are ready.
